  3. offonoff

EOH

Colde

Introduction

offonoff is a male duo, consisting of EOH & Colde. They began releasing music on SoundCloud in 2015 before signing with YG Entertainment's independent sub-label Highgrnd in 2016. They officially debuted on September 21, 2016 with their first single "Bath".
